      • getRow

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getRow(java.lang.String tableName,
                                                               java.lang.String matchName,
                                                               java.lang.String matchValue)
                                                        throws java.sql.SQLException
        Parameters:
        tableName - The name of the Table.
        matchName - The column to match.
        matchValue - The value to match on the column.
        Returns:
        Returns a map of the first matched row of a given table.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - Thrown when any issues arise.
